title: Just Ok not much variety of fish
review: Just Ok place.. Only thing good is that it is an island accessible only by boat. Kids liked it. Variety of fish is limited.. Nothing extraordinary

title: Island
review: This is located on an island in the Bhimtal Lake.

title: Useless
review: How government can destroy any thing. Bhootal fish aquarium is perfect example of that. Nothing was there. Only few fishes. Totally useless.

title: Well-Maintained Aquarium
review: This aquarium is very well maintained and a lot of varieties of aquatic life can be seen here. Entry fee is also very nominal.

title: Unusual place
review: Have been to many aquariums in and abroad but this one was a bit unique as you need to travel on a boat to actually reach there.

title: Bhimtal aquarium.
review: Aquarium is in the middle of the lake. A person has to buy tickets for entry to the aquarium and also the boat ride in advance from the agents. Tickets cost Rs 60 per person and boat rides are decided on the whims of the agents . If slightly windy they cost more. Boat ride is hardly 150 m and cost about as much. Aquarium is decrepit. No maintenance. About 20 Small aquariums with tiny fish  no lights and half of them are empty. A dry fountain which is a visitors hazard is there. Not a place to visit after all the cost and  effort.

title: Poorly maintained aquarium
review: We took a special boat ride to visit the aquarium. Very disappointed, waste of time and money. Not recommended

title: Aquarium in the middle of Bhimtaal
review: A mid sized aquarium in maintained in the middle of bhimtaal. Accessible by boats. Can visit to see varieties of fishes here.

title: Aquarium with average collection
review: There is a small island in the midst of Bhimtal lake. Earlier it used to be a restaurant which has now been converted to an Aquarium. One can read it by boat only. The entry charge is Rs.60 and the boat charge is Rs.240 for 2 adults and 2 kids. Nothing special about the collection and one can avoid it too.

title: Aquarium in the middle of the lake
review: This small fish aquarium is situated in the middle of the Bhimtal Lake. You can visit this aquarium by boat only. Ticket rates are around 60 rs per person. Timing is from 10 am to 6.30 pm only. Nothing special about the collection of fishes. It is not properly maintained so you can skip it if you don't have children with you.

title: Nothing place really!!!
review: Its just a corridor containing 10-12 aquarium boxes and hand full of fishes. A surprise highlight is the Pirahana fish present there.

title: Just OhkaY
review: It has some fishes there.

title: Review of Aquarium
review: The aquarium is advertised in the places to see in Bhimtal. The boat ride of hardly 150mtrs cost Rs.120/- per person but costs 180 person instead on the whims of the agent if it is windy. I paid Rs 180/-per person.Besides one ticket for the aquarium cost Rs 60/-.

title: Average .
review: Not looked after. Felt sorry for the fishes. Aquarium isn't worth visiting. 60 rs per person. not maintained at all.

title: Bhimtal Aquarium
review: Small but well maintained . Fish tanks were clean. Few good collections of fish.Very quiet place.Good!

title: Could have been better
review: The man in charge of tickets was awful. Even when the aquarium is open till 7 pm, he refused to give us tickets at 5:55 pm. We had a major brawl before the other shopkeepers intervened and compelled the man to give us the tickets.

title: Calm and serene
review: Was nice and had a tower to take photos the scenery is good from that place, not a a well maintained aquarium but we enjoyed on our own

title: Aquarium is excellent
review: Excellent - you can see big fishes in the Aquarium - well maintained by Kumaon Mandal Vikas Nigam. Visit with Familhy and Children. Keep Bhimtal Lake Clean

title: Bhimtal Island
review: Apart from few overpriced eateries nothing special about this location. If you want to have a feel of being on an island and take few photographs, should visit otherwise avoid.

title: Nice
review: I visited here when I was at bhimtal lake.I cum to know from local people there about this.its govt property and it's ticket you have to buy from counter at very nominal rate.You can see different breeds of fishes.

title: Must watch
review: With my little knowledge, I am not aware of any such facility in India.

title: Its a collection of few home size acquariums
review: There is not a lot to see here. Its basically a collection of few home sized aquariums. You can not see the fishes clearly either. Tickets are 60Rs for an adult and boat ride to aquarium is another 130. Not worth the time and money at all!

title: One time Watch
review: Bhimtal Island Aquarium is nice and one time watch is fine for kids. This Aquarium is in the mid of Bhimtal and you can see the different kinds of fishes.

title: Worst Fish Museum
review: This fish aquarium is in a very bad state. It seems like the concerned authorities are not taking any care of this place. I paid Rs 60 per person but it is not worth for even Rs 10. Better have a round in the boat and see these fish aquariums from the boat itself as it can easily be seen from there.

title: Can be skipped
review: This place is in the center of the Bhimtal lake. To reach there, you need to hire a boat which will cost you around 120 INR. The aquarium is average with limited number of fishes. You can skip this place if you are tight on budget.

title: Kids love it but can be imporved
review: The journey to the museum and the fact of it being an island is fascinating to kids and they enjoy seeing the fish too. But the maintenance is not adequate. Last time (March 2016) we had seen quite a few dorsal and tang fish. But they are dead now and the coral is turning black. Same with the star fish. Many of the fish are not properly identified and described. A shade will definitely help in a better view as few of the tanks are not visible because of the strong sun light.

title: Awesome Place
review: Beautiful aquarium in the middle of lake showing different spices of fishes,one can also spend time to see lake from here

title: very  beautiful for children
review: 60 rs ticket for adult...rs 130 is charged by boat man to reach the Aquarium island....otherwise total 210 rs is charged including half trip of lake and aquarium it is total for 1 boat....

title: Good Place for Children
review: Bhimtal lake has an island located with in it, which as fast as had eating place . but, the restaurant have become closed down due to pollutants issues and an modified into aquarium in its area with the aid of the Nainital  lake development  authority. The aquarium is now home to fishes introduced from international locations like China, South Africa a and Mexico. it's far one of the elements of interest at Bhimtal.  Bhimtal is properly related with memorable roads connection most vital cites and towns of Uttarakhand state nearest railway station Kathgodam is 25 kms away.

title: Seems very ill managed and saw many fish tanks with dead livestock
review: It is not worth visiting.We were a family with kids and the kids were very excited to see the aquarium as we too have one back home.It was very disheartening to see that none of the aquariums was maintained/clean there was very poor lighting and aquarium walls were covered with algae which effected visibility.We saw at least two tanks with dead livestock which was rotting away.There was one large Marine ( Sea water) fish tank which had two fish which were gasping for breath and another two which were already dead.Upon touching the walls of the tank it was clear that the temperature of water was very cold which might have been the reason for the fish deaths. The heater inside the tank seemed not to be working.The  staff at the aquarium did not understand much about the temperature and fish deaths etc.. and was also not interested in our concerns.A total waste of time and heartless to see poor souls been kept in such condition !!

title: Not worth a boat trip to see
review: We had planned for this for our young son but the variety or the quality is not just upto the standard expected. The ticket is over-priced compared to the cobtent. It seemed to be a waste of time & money.

title: A nicely maintained Aquarium
review: If you are going for boating in Bhimtal lake then donot forget to take tickets for this too!!! Kids will just love it!!!

title: Place is not worth to visit but if you have time and money you can visit
review: Hi all,

title: An aquarium island in d bhimtal lake
review: Well the stricking feature is d location of this aquarium.. with a reasonable fee one can additionally see this place right during the boat rides of bhimtal lake.. there are many varieties of fishes including the exotic one's.. it's a place for short visit of less than 15 mins

title: Small but Must to visit...
review: The place is around 20 km from Nainital. The lake is good to visit. Though covered boats (Shikara) is not available you can enjoy boating may be before 10 and after 5 pm here during sunny days. There is a small aquarium with a entry ticket of Rs 60 on the island in lake. Its a small island and close from the land but the hiring a boat is must. They charge Rs 120 to and from aquarium, which is a good deal rather than pleasurably boating here. For boating pleasure the main Nainital lake is good. Other than this Navkuchiya Tal and Sat Tal is preferable due to the availability of Shikara here which you can enjoy even when sun shines bright.

title: Go there if you have nothing better to do in Bhimtal!
review: Stumbled upon this place because we had a lot of time in our hands and had covered most of the places already.

title: amzaing aquarium
review: this is very amazing place in bheem tal this place is very beautiful this is silhouetted around of water

title: Good collection of aquatic species
review: Good location (island) and perfect view, this place is more than just aquarium with loads of variety of fish. Boat can be hired on govt defined rates and you can spend peaceful time there

title: Fishes of all kinds
review: One has to take a boat to reach there. My husband remembered that years ago, Bhimtal was less crowded and the aquarium was not there. You pay for the boat, wear life jackets and board the boat to reach the aquarium. Another family was there with young children, who squealed at the sight of so many kinds of fishes. Some fish were even diabolical looking. One can go atop to have a view of the lake.

title: Worth watching
review: Lake is island previously it is restaurant but now aquarium is there. Entry fee is there which is high.

title: Small but decent
review: Its situated on the island of Bhimtal lake and one needs to take a boat ride to reach here, its clean and have decent variety of fishes, although names were not written properly and creates a bit of confusion.

title: aquarium in the middle of the lake
review: Not well maintained,nothing spectacular but enjoyed the ride by the shikara to the aquarium.View from the top of the aquarium is great .

title: Aquarium is situated in the middle of the bhimtal
review: Aquarium is in an island and only way to reach is by boat. Earlier this was a restaurant and now it is converted to an aquarium. The entry fee is Rs 60/- per adults and Rs 30/- for children. Cameras are allowed without any extra charges. To reach this aquarium both way boat charges is Rs 100/- . You can spend 20 to 30 minutes inside the aquarium. This is not so exclusive aquarium but good to enjoy the beauty of surrounding from an island within the Bhimtal lake.

title: Good aquarium for kids to enjoy
review: The aquarium is located on a small island in middle of the lake and can be accessed only by boat. Though the aquarium is not very well maintained, it is a good option for showing various fish varieties to kids.

title: Nice place to visit
review: The visit to island is good. You have to travel via boat and this makes the experience good. The fishes are small ones, but interesting varieties. Children will enjoy.

title: Okay to visit
review: Nothing much. Just about the only place you can go in the area. It is in the centre of the lake, so you'll have to hire a boat to take you there

title: Fun for small children
review: Have to take boat to see this. It is in middle of lake. Few fishes I had never seen before. kids will enjoy this place

title: Not a good aquarium
review: The aquarium is not worth the price they charge. There are a few species of fish you do not usually see, though.

title: Quite a nice one
review: If you are taking a boat ride, do stop by this island. The aquarium is well maintained. It offers 360 degree views of the lake.

title: Interesting
review: Though this is small, it is in the middle of the lake There are fig trees nearby and you can taste the fruit.

title: Aquarium at Bhimtal
review: Great place to see, most of the time people miss this as you require to go by boat and tickets need to be taken in advance from where you hire the boat, Boatwala will alway say there is noting to see but its amazing and hard to believe...

title: Aquarium for Kids
review: This aquarium is located in the Bhimtal lake around 100m from the shore and can be accessed through boating. The aquarium is well maintained with quite good number of fishes in it. Kids will love it specially and ticket is also not that high 60rs per head and kids below 3 yeard no charge for them.

title: Aquarium in the island
review: This aquarium is located in the Bhimtal lake around 100m from the shore and can be accessed through boating. The aquarium is well maintained with quite good number of fishes in it. View point for the entire lake located on top of this aquarium from which we can get good photographic views of the lake and boating. Entry fees is too high considering the size of the aquarium. Those who visit bhimtal lake can visit and I am sure pet lovers will love visiting this. I personally feel that this should be expanded and more breeds of fishes to be brought.

title: Aquarium in middle of lake
review: It have multiple aquarium which contain different fishes..the boat will take you to the middle of the lake where this aquarium building is located..beautiful view..fresh air..a must visit place

title: If you like fishes you will enjoy
review: We love to watch all kinds of fishes. We enjoyed it thoroughly. They have many kinds of fishes here including the piranhas.  You will be going around the island once as you watch those fishes in the circle. Actually you enjoy going to the very island just to view the lake around you and to have the good boating experience. We went to the terrace and liked the view too!
